FuncDef:
The version command configures an ERPS version.
The undo version command restores the default ERPS version.
By default, ERPSv1 is used.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
ERPSv1 and ERPSv2 are currently available. ERPSv2, fully compatible with ERPSv1, provides the following enhanced functions:
Supports multi-ring topologies, such as intersecting rings.Supports ring auto protection switching protocol data unit (R-APS PDU) transmission modes on sub-rings.Supports two manual port blocking modes: forced switch (FS) and manual switch (MS).Supports both revertive and non-revertive switching.
To configure an ERPS version, run the version command.

Precautions
Before specifying ERPSv1 for an ERPSv2-running device, delete all ERPS configurations that ERPSv1 does not support. Otherwise, the version cannot be changed.
